definition.name: Checkbox
definition.purpose: Allow users to select or deselect a boolean option in forms or lists
definition.description: A styled checkbox component built on top of Radix UI's CheckboxPrimitive. It supports all standard checkbox props and is visually enhanced for consistent UI. The component displays a check icon when checked and handles disabled and invalid states with appropriate styles.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the checkbox root element

enabled: Checkbox can be toggled unless disabled

visible: Checkbox box with or without check icon

effects: Checkbox state is toggled and onChange handler is called if provided

visible: Checkbox box with reduced opacity and not interactive

definition.visualLayout: A small square box with rounded corners, border, and a check icon when checked. Styled for accessibility and visual consistency.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI CheckboxPrimitive. Uses a utility function for className merging and Lucide React for the check icon.
